mapper.select: SELECT fpf.fact_pf_key, pw.key, fpf.production_type, fpf.action_time, date(fpf.action_time) as action_date, fpf.finish_time, operator.name AS operator_name, operator.operator_id, operator.job_no, COALESCE(pw.warehouse_no,material.omr_notifi_no) AS warehouse_no FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN operator ON fpf.operator_id = operator.operator_id LEFT JOIN partial_warehouse pw ON pw.key = fpf.partial_warehouse_key LEFT JOIN material ON material.material_id = fpf.material_id WHERE fpf.action_time >= #{start_date} AND fpf.finish_time < DATE_ADD(#{start_date},INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY action_date,operator.job_no,action_time

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(temp.recept),0) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN pbs.box_count = -1 THEN 1 * pbs.recept ELSE CEIL(SUM(pwd.quantity) / pbs.box_count) * pbs.recept END AS recept FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key} GROUP BY v_partial.spec_kind ) temp

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pwd.quantity * pbs.collect_case),0) FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind JOIN fact_production_feature fpf ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key WHERE pwd.key = #{key}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pwd.collation_quantity * pbs.collation),0) FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(temp.time),0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(pwd.collation_quantity) * pbs.collation as time FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON v_partial.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key} GROUP BY pwd.partial_id,pwd.seq) temp
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(fpw.quantity * pbs.unpack),0) FROM fact_partial_warehouse fpw JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON fpw.spec_kind = pbs.spec_kind WHERE fpw.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(fpw.quantity) * pbs.on_shelf,0) FROM fact_partial_warehouse fpw JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON fpw.spec_kind = pbs.spec_kind WHERE fpw.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}

SELECT v_partial.spec_kind, CASE WHEN pbs.box_count = -1 THEN 1 ELSE CEIL(SUM(pwd.quantity) / pbs.box_count) END AS quantity FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key} GROUP BY v_partial.spec_kind

SELECT v_partial.spec_kind, SUM(pwd.collation_quantity) AS quantity FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key} GROUP BY v_partial.spec_kind

SELECT temp.spec_kind, COALESCE(SUM(temp.quantity),0) as quantity FROM (SELECT v_partial.spec_kind, COUNT(pwd.collation_quantity) AS quantity FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key} GROUP BY pwd.partial_id,pwd.seq) temp GROUP BY temp.spec_kind
SELECT spec_kind, quantity FROM fact_partial_warehouse fpw WHERE fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}
SELECT fpc.comment FROM fact_production_feature fpf JOIN fact_production_comment fpc ON fpf.fact_pf_key = fpc.fact_pf_key WHERE fpf.fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}

SELECT DATE(finish_time) AS finish_time, CASE WHEN production_type = 11 THEN 10 ELSE production_type END AS production_types, CEIL(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,action_time,finish_time)) / 60) AS spendTime, SUM(TIME(finish_time) > '17:30:00') AS overtime_flg FROM fact_production_feature WHERE operator_id = #{operatorId} AND action_time >= #{start_date} AND finish_time < DATE_ADD( #{start_date},INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE(finish_time),production_types

SELECT fact_pf_key, partial_warehouse_key AS `key` FROM fact_production_feature WHERE operator_id = #{operatorId} AND production_type = #{production_type} AND action_time >= #{start_date} AND finish_time < DATE_ADD( #{start_date},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
